MemoryInfobox.description: 'General Demosthenes  asked the Kassandra|Eagle Bearer to fight on behalf of Athens at the battle of Megaris.'

General_Description: '''The Final Battle''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: General [[Demosthenes]] asked the Eagle Bearer to fight on behalf of [[Athens]] at the [[Battle of Megaris]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra spoke to '''Demosthenes'''.
*'''Demosthenes:''' ''I know you've played both sides like a typical misthios. But now it's time to choose: The winning side or pathetic failure.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Athens will triumph.''
*'''Demosthenes:''' ''Then welcome to the winning side of history.''
Kassandra joined the Athenians in battle, killing a number of Spartan soldiers. They ultimately won the battle.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Athens to defeat the Spartan army in battle.
Section_Behind_the_scenes:
Accepting and completing "The Final Battle" locks "[[Nemesis (memory)|Nemesis]]" from [[Lysander]].

Given that the battle is possibly inspired by the historical [[Battle of Megaris|Battle of Megara]] in 424 BCE won by Athenian forces, the memory "Nemesis" may be non-canon.
